description: From a dialectal pronunciation of roil.

verbs.description: rile (third-person singular simple present riles, present participle riling, simple past and past participle riled)

entries.meaning: To stir or move from a state of calm or order.
examples: Money problems rile the underpaid worker every day.
Mosquitoes buzzing in my ear really rile me.
It riles me that she never closes the door after she leaves.
